idea-plugin.name: PySynthetic
idea-plugin.description: A plugin to provide IDE assistance for members and constructors generated by PySynthetic.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.4.0: Restore auto-completion improvements for accessors, more complete contract support, warn on unfilled synthetic init parameter.
0.3.2: Fix bugs of 0.3.1, remove auto-completion improvements for get/set accessors.
0.3.1: Fixes to synthetic Initializer support, improved auto-completion for get/set accessors.
0.3.0: Synthetic Initializer support.
0.2.0: Type-based auto-completion for generated members and properties based on the specified contract. Only a very limited set of contract expressions is currently supported.
0.1.0: Initial version - provides name autocompletion for members and properties.
Full changelog on Github
